content: How many curve shades can I create?
According to the document, you can create 250 curve shades.
How many curves can I load in one go?
You can load up to 450 curves at a time.
What the maximum number of headers I can display in my log?
The maximum number of headers you can display in your log is up to 50.
How many tables can I have in my log?
You can have up to 100 tables in a log.
